pageTitle: Itinerary for Thursday, September 13, 2018 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Saskatoon, Saskatchewan

8:00 a.m. The Prime Minister will attend the National Caucus meeting.

Closed to media

12:45 p.m. The Prime Minister will hold a media availability.

Battleford Room, Delta Hotels Bessborough
601 Spadina Crescent East  

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media should present themselves at the Spadina Room on the Mezzanine Level no later than 12:15 p.m.

2:15 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a town hall at the Saskatchewan Polytechnicâ€™s Saskatoon Campus.

Saskatchewan Polytechnic, Saskatoon Campus, Gymnasium
1130 Idylwyld Drive North

Notes for media:

    • Open coverage
    • Media are asked to arrive no later than 1:30 p.m.
